Forever Powell

Welcome to our wedding website. We are so happy that you have taken this moment to check in with us as we look forward to our upcoming marriage. Invited guests, you will find all the information you need here to join us on our special day. Nearby hotels are listed, and a portal is provided for RSVP. We hope to enjoy the presence of your company on March 1, 2019. Let the countdown begin!!

How We Met

Our story began in October 2012. We were set up on a blind date by a mutual friend at California State University, Fullerton. We had our first date on campus, playing pool in the student union. Eventually we fell out of touch, before rekindling our friendship a couple months later. After a great day at the beach, we decided to give dating another shot. Despite differing views on sports teams (go Lakers!), we have been inseparable ever since!

The Proposal

Throughout our relationship, we have always loved to travel. From a cruise and ATV ride in Mexico to a wedding in Jamaica, we have had many adventures together. It was after the time that we spent in Jamaica where Ryon really felt like he had found his life partner, unbeknownst to Victoria. After all the planning and fun they had experienced, Ryon knew he had found a special woman he didn’t want to live without. A great year and a half goes by, and the time has come to take our relationship and commitment to the next level! Ryon decides to propose on the same beach where we had decided to become more than friends. This time, he gets down on one knee, and promises to be Victoria’s best friend for the rest of their lives, and start the next chapter in their journey together.

  • Nearby Hotels

    We have a block of rooms reserved at The Dana for our wedding guest. To receive a fifteen percent discount at booking mention the name of the couple when you make your reservation. If you reserve as a part of our room block you will also receive free parking and a daily discount on meals at the hotel.

    http://www.thedana.com/

    For those looking for a more luxury stay, the Hyatt Regency is also located less than a mile from the wedding venue and provides great views of the bay.

    missionbay.regency.hyatt.com

  • Fun things to do!

    We hope that you will enjoy your visit to San Diego and find some time to see the city! While you are here you might consider visiting some of the following places.

    Sea World

    Sea World is located directly across from our wedding venue. At this amusement park, you can enjoy the shamu show along with various rides and other forms of entertainment. Sea World Website

    The Historic Balboa Park

    Take a trip down to San Diego’s historic park and museum district. Enjoy the free botanical garden. And low cost art and humanities museums. The Ruben H. Fleet Aerospace center is also a lot of fun. Here you can see an IMAX film featuring wildlife from across the world. Balboa Park Website

We hope to see you soon!
